Message:
Some time ago,
I ventured into
a remote region.

War left the land with
nothing but scars.

when a lack of supplies
left us defenseless...

Just when I thought
this place had been
completely wiped out,

specially crafted to
protect their wielders
rather than kill an enemy.

It was my first time
seeing weapons like those.

I eventually found myself
wanting to meet the one
who made them,

I also had requests
from the village children
to take care of, after all.

Waiting for me at
the end of my search
was a blacksmith.

But, her eyes were
full of darkness,
and her heart
tightly locked away.
